statements: SELECT * FROM BalanceMonitor ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_number, current_balance FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit'
SELECT id, transaction_date FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE current_balance < 0
SELECT * FROM BalanceMonitor ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM BalanceMonitor
SELECT * FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE account_number = 12345;
SELECT id, current_balance, transaction_type FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM BalanceMonitor GROUP BY account_number HAVING total_transactions > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM BalanceMonitor;
SELECT id, current_balance FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE current_balance < 0 ORDER BY current_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_activity WHERE transaction_type='Deposit' AND transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_activity GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY average_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM transaction_activity WHERE transaction_type = 'Withdrawal'
SELECT * FROM transaction_activity ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE account_id = 1001 AND transaction_type = 'DEPOSIT';
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, amount, reason FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount >= 500 AND reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_holder_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY balance ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500) ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 20;

SELECT account_holder_name, balance, transaction_type FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE accounts.is_active = TRUE AND transactions.amount > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM AccountBalance;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalance WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance, last_updated FROM AccountBalance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM TransactionHistory ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalance WHERE balance < 0.00 ORDER BY balance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT detection_id, fraud_score FROM FraudDetection WHERE fraud_score >= 90 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, suspicious_reason FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE account_id = 1001 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT alert_id, account_id, alert_message FROM AlertLog WHERE account_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC LIMIT 7
